postReview.title: Leeds United 1-0 Everton: Penalti de Nmecha sella una victoria luchada en Elland Road
postReview.description: Leeds United se unió a Sunderland en hacer un comienzo ganador tras el ascenso a la Premier League, superando a Everton en Elland Road.

postReview.title: Leeds United 1-0 Everton: Nmecha penalty seals battling win at Elland Road
postReview.description: Leeds United joined Sunderland in making a winning start following promotion to the Premier League, seeing off Everton at Elland Road.

postReview.title: Leeds United 1-0 Everton: Rigore di Nmecha sigilla la vittoria combattuta ad Elland Road
postReview.description: Il Leeds United si è unito al Sunderland facendo un esordio vincente dopo la promozione in Premier League, superando l'Everton ad Elland Road.

postReview.title: Leeds United 1-0 Everton: Pênalti de Nmecha garante vitória batalhada em Elland Road
postReview.description: O Leeds United juntou-se ao Sunderland fazendo um começo vencedor após a promoção à Premier League, derrotando o Everton em Elland Road.

postReview.title: Leeds United 1-0 Everton : un penalty de Nmecha scelle une victoire durement acquise à Elland Road
postReview.description: Leeds United a rejoint Sunderland en débutant par une victoire après leur promotion en Premier League, s'imposant contre Everton à Elland Road.

postReview.title: Leeds United 1-0 Everton: Nmecha-Elfmeter sichert kämpferischen Sieg an Elland Road
postReview.description: Leeds United gesellte sich zu Sunderland, indem sie nach dem Aufstieg in die Premier League mit einem Sieg starteten, und besiegten Everton an Elland Road.

postReview.title: ليدز يونايتد 1-0 إيفرتون: ركلة جزاء إنميتشا تؤمن الفوز الكفاحي في إلاند رود
postReview.description: انضم ليدز يونايتد إلى سندرلاند في تحقيق بداية فائزة بعد الصعود إلى الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز، حيث تغلب على إيفرتون في إلاند رود.

postReview.title: Leeds United 1-0 Everton: Pênalti de Nmecha garante vitória batalhadora em Elland Road
postReview.description: O Leeds United juntou-se ao Sunderland ao fazer um início vitorioso após a promoção à Premier League, vencendo o Everton em Elland Road.

preReview.title: Farke espera una 'ocasión asombrosa' cuando Leeds enfrente a Everton en el estreno de la Premier League
preReview.description: Daniel Farke quiere que su equipo de Leeds United se reestablezca inmediatamente en la Premier League cuando enfrenten a Everton el lunes.

preReview.title: Farke expecting 'amazing' occasion when Leeds face Everton in Premier League opener
preReview.description: Daniel Farke wants his Leeds United team to immediately re-establish themselves in the Premier League when they face Everton on Monday.

preReview.title: Farke prevede un'occasione 'straordinaria' quando il Leeds affronta l'Everton nell'apertura della Premier League
preReview.description: Daniel Farke vuole che la sua squadra del Leeds United si ristabilisca immediatamente in Premier League quando affronterà l'Everton lunedì.

preReview.title: Farke espera uma ocasião 'incrível' quando Leeds enfrentar o Everton na abertura da Premier League
preReview.description: Daniel Farke quer que seu time do Leeds United se reafirme imediatamente na Premier League quando enfrentar o Everton na segunda-feira.

preReview.title: Farke erwartet ein 'erstaunliches' Ereignis, wenn Leeds im Premier-League-Auftakt auf Everton trifft
preReview.description: Daniel Farke möchte, dass sich sein Leeds United-Team sofort in der Premier League wieder etablieren, wenn sie am Montag auf Everton treffen.

preReview.title: Farke s'attend à une occasion 'incroyable' lorsque Leeds affrontera Everton lors de l'ouverture de la Premier League
preReview.description: Daniel Farke veut que son équipe de Leeds United se réimpose immédiatement en Premier League lorsqu'elle affrontera Everton lundi.

preReview.title: فارك يتوقع مناسبة 'مدهشة' عندما يواجه ليدز إيفرتون في افتتاح الدوري الممتاز
preReview.description: دانيل فارك يريد من فريقه ليدز يونايتد إعادة إثبات أنفسهم فورًا في الدوري الممتاز عندما يواجهون إيفرتون يوم الاثنين.

preReview.title: Farke espera 'ocasião incrível' quando Leeds enfrentar o Everton na estreia da Premier League
preReview.description: Daniel Farke quer que sua equipe do Leeds United se restabeleça imediatamente na Premier League quando enfrentar o Everton na segunda-feira.

QAData.question: Who won between Leeds United and Everton on Mon, 18 Aug 2025 19:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Leeds United won 1–0 over Everton on Mon, 18 Aug 2025 19:00:00 GMT.
